exceptions.this recipe is taken: Oh snap! This recipe is already taken. Try with other ingredients.
exceptions.total coin percentage is not 100: The total percentage of the selected coin pairs must be 100%. Amend the percentages accordingly.
exceptions.percentage of a coin incremental of 5: The percentages must be divisible by 5. Amend the percentages accordingly.
exceptions.coin is not supported: One of the coin pairs is not supported. Please ask for support from the site owner.

exceptions.example: READ THIS! This is the format to use if a function requires special treatment
